_a-0000e393-fbf1-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_DSP_displayHeader

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_displayValue
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
displayvalue(
  
  ri!value,
  
  ri!inArray,
  
  ri!replacement,
  
  if(
    
    ri!firstIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[1],
    
    ri!lastIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[count(ri!replacement)],
    
    ri!customDefault
  )
)

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey

_a-0000ea13-fcbd-8000-9c86-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CPS_cardsAsSectionedSideNavigation
_a-0000ea13-fcbd-8000-9c86-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: ri!choices,
  expression: rule!AS_CO_CPS_richTextSection(
    sectionLabel: fv!item.label,
    contents: rule!AS_GSS_CRD_cardsAsSideNavigation(
      choiceIcons: fv!item.choiceIcons,
      choiceLabels: fv!item.choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: fv!item.choiceValues,
      choiceLinks: fv!item.choiceLinks,
      value: ri!value,
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      selectedIcon: ri!selectedIcon,
      showItemCount: false,
      isChecklistStatus: false,
      i18nData: ri!i18nData
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_not

_a-0000ee42-8707-8000-9e2b-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_HCL_displayWrapperContents

_a-0000e447-9390-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_TMG_BL_taskManagementOptions

_a-0000e9b7-c1f0-8000-9c5e-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CRD_cardsAsSideNavigation
_a-0000e9b7-c1f0-8000-9c5e-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!choiceValues,
    expression: a!localVariables(
      local!isSelected: rule!AS_CO_UT_compare(
        value1: ri!value,
        value2: ri!choiceValues[fv!index]
      ),
      local!hasLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(cdt: ri!choiceLabels, field: fv!index)),
      local!itemIcon: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(cdt:ri!choiceIcons, field: fv!index),
      local!itemLink: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(cdt:ri!choiceLinks, field: fv!index),
      local!iconToShow: if(
        local!isSelected,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
          nullableValue: ri!selectedIcon,
          replacementValue: local!itemIcon
        ),
        local!itemIcon
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
        contents: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
            labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
            value: {
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: {
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(icon: local!iconToShow, size: "MEDIUM"),
                  " "
                },
                showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!iconToShow)
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: ri!choiceLabels[fv!index],
                size: "MEDIUM",
                showWhen: local!hasLabel,
                color: if(ri!isChecklistStatus, "ACCENT", {})
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: " (" & ri!itemCount[fv!index] & ")",
                size: "MEDIUM",
                color: if(ri!isChecklistStatus, "ACCENT", {}),
                showWhen: ri!showItemCount
              )
            }
          )
        },
        link: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!itemLink),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
            value: ri!choiceValues[fv!index],
            saveInto: ri!saveInto,
            showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!disabled)
          ),
          local!itemLink
        ),
        accessibilityText: if(
          local!isSelected,
          "Selected",
          ""
        ),
        style: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_not(local!isSelected),
          "NONE",
          ri!disabled,
          "STANDARD",
          "ACCENT"
        ),
        showBorder: false
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_compare

_a-0000e447-9390-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_TMG_CPS_taskManagementPage

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_CPS_richTextSection

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)
